      • setSelfRoR

        public void setSelfRoR(RemoteObjectRef selfRoR)
        Description copied from interface: RMIRemoteStub
        Sets the selfRoR field of the Remote Object Stub to be its Remote Object Reference. Useful for methods where at least one parameter is also a remote object, and we wish to pass it by Reference instead of by Value.
        Specified by:
        setSelfRoR in interface RMIRemoteStub

      • secretMethod

        public int secretMethod(java.lang.Object srv,
               int x)
                 throws RMIInvocationException
        Description copied from interface: CalculatorServer
        This method tests invoking an RMI method with another RMI object as parameter. By calling this method, the RMI framework passes the parameter by Reference instead of by Value. It returns the length of the ZipCodeList of the ZipCodeServer instance, plus the second parameter x.
        Specified by:
        secretMethod in interface CalculatorServer
        Parameters:
        srv - ZipCodeServer object whose length we wish to examine
        x - Value to add to the length of ZipCodeList
        Returns:
        Length of ZipCodeList plus the second parameter
        Throws:
        RMIInvocationException
